entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Sherbrooke
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:02 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, 0.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sherbrooke Airport 01:49 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: 0.2°C
Pressure: 100.8 kPa
Visibility: 2.8 km
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: -0.1°C
Wind: ENE 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow or rain. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain before morning. Risk of freezing rain before morning. Snow over northern sections. Snowfall amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light before morning. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Rain mixed with freezing rain. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Rain or freezing rain changing to snow late in the afternoon. Snow at times heavy over northern sections. Snowfall amount 15 cm over northern sections. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow ending in the evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
